verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329><s%> Musician <S%H5329><s%> upon Mahalath, <S%H4257><s%> Maschil, <S%H4905><s%> A Psalm of David. <S%H1732><s%> The fool <S%H5036><s%> has said <S%H559><s%> in his heart, <S%H3820><s%> There is no <S%H369><s%> God. <S%H430><s%> Corrupt <S%H7843><s%> are they, and have done abominable <S%H8581><s%> iniquity: <S%H5766><s%> there is none <S%H369><s%> that does <S%H6213><s%> good. <S%H2896><s%>

God <S%H430><s%> looked <S%H8259><s%> down from heaven <S%H8064><s%> on the children <S%H1121><s%> of men, <S%H120><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> if there were any that did understand, <S%H7919><s%> that did seek <S%H1875><s%> God. <S%H430><s%>

Every <S%H3605><s%> one of them is gone <S%H5472><s%> back: <S%H5472><s%> they are altogether <S%H3162><s%> become <S%H444><s%> filthy; <S%H444><s%> there is none <S%H369><s%> that does <S%H6213><s%> good, <S%H2896><s%> no, not one. <S%H259><s%>

Have the workers <S%H6466><s%> of iniquity <S%H205><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> knowledge? <S%H3045><s%> who eat <S%H398><s%> up my people <S%H5971><s%> as they eat <S%H398><s%> bread: <S%H3899><s%> they have not called <S%H7121><s%> on God. <S%H430><s%>

There <S%H8033><s%> were they in great fear, <S%H6343><s%> where no <S%H3808><s%> fear <S%H6343><s%> was: for God <S%H430><s%> has scattered <S%H6340><s%> the bones <S%H6106><s%> of him that encamps <S%H2583><s%> against you: you have put them to shame, <S%H954><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> God <S%H430><s%> has despised <S%H3988><s%> them.

Oh that the salvation <S%H3444><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were come out of Zion! <S%H6726><s%> When God <S%H430><s%> brings <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of his people, <S%H5971><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> shall rejoice, <S%H1523><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall be glad. <S%H8056><s%>
